content:
CiTIUS, Research Centre on Intelligent Technologies of the University of Santiago de Compostela, looks for 4 outstanding and highly motivated candidates interested in developing a PhD in one of four Scientific Programmes:

  • Advanced Computing
  • Approximate Processing
  • Artificial Vision
  • e-Health
  • Machine Learning
  • Natural Language Technologies
  • Personal Robots
  • Semiconductor Devices and Autonomous Sensors

Further info, application form and details at CiTIUS Website

DEADLINE: 10th July, 2020 23:59 CEST

If interested, send an email to Alberto Bugarín (alberto.bugarin.diz@usc.es)

Open positions
4 predoctoral contracts
sender_full_name: Alberto Bugarín (CiTIUS - University of Santiago de Compostela, ES)
